name: V0id
description:
It is the year 3851 after the destruction of Planet Earth. Humans are long gone and robots managed to salvage ancient technology to conquer the universe.

You are a cyborg pilot trying to escape the outer rim. There is a catch: you have to face the large army of caldron ships. Destroy them all!

programming & art @bitbrain

music @k0stnix

🐛 Report a bug
